pageContent.title: GitHub Pages
pageContent.body: The GitHub repository for this webpage.

pageContent.title: Login / Signup UI
pageContent.body: A mockup design that combines Login and Signup in a single webpage using CSS and JavaScript for form transitions.

pageContent.title: PIXIV Downloader
pageContent.body: A scraping tool to download user artworks on the PIXIV Website using C# and Selenium.

pageContent.title: Research Paper
pageContent.header: Research Paper: Detecting Biodegradable Materials in Waste Piles Using YOLO Object Detection Model
pageContent.body: Written as a requirement for university, this paper studies the usefulness and effectiveness of real-time object detection for garbage segregation.
